# Template de archivo de variables de entorno

```bash

# ENVS LOCAL
LOCAL_HOST = http://localhost:9999
LOCAL_PORT = 9999

# ENVS DEV
DEV_HOST = http://localhost:9998
DEV_PORT = 9998

# ENVS PROD
PROD_HOST = http://localhost:9999
PROD_PORT = 9999

# env routemap
DEBUG_ROUTEMAP = false

# dev credentials
DEV_EMAILS = { "emails": ["email@email.com"] }

# DEV firebase server credentials
DEV_SERVER_TYPE =
DEV_SERVER_PROJECT_ID =
DEV_SERVER_PRIVATE_KEY_ID =
DEV_SERVER_PRIVATE_KEY =
DEV_SERVER_CLIENT_EMAIL =
DEV_SERVER_CLIENT_ID =
DEV_SERVER_AUTH_URI =
DEV_SERVER_TOKER_URI =
DEV_SERVER_AUTH_PROVIDER_X509_CERT_URL =
DEV_SERVER_CLIENT_X509_CERT_URL =

# DEV firebase client credentials
DEV_CLIENT_API_KEY =
DEV_CLIENT_AUTH_DOMAIN =
DEV_CLIENT_DATABASE_URL =
DEV_CLIENT_PROJECT_ID =
DEV_CLIENT_STORAGE_BUCKET =
DEV_CLIENT_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID =

# DEV firebase database credentials
DEV_SERVER_DATABASE_URL =

# PROD firebase server credentials
PROD_SERVER_TYPE =
PROD_SERVER_PROJECT_ID =
PROD_SERVER_PRIVATE_KEY_ID =
PROD_SERVER_PRIVATE_KEY =
PROD_SERVER_CLIENT_EMAIL =
PROD_SERVER_CLIENT_ID =
PROD_SERVER_AUTH_URI =
PROD_SERVER_TOKER_URI =
PROD_SERVER_AUTH_PROVIDER_X509_CERT_URL =
PROD_SERVER_CLIENT_X509_CERT_URL =

# PROD firebase client credentials
PROD_CLIENT_API_KEY =
PROD_CLIENT_AUTH_DOMAIN =
PROD_CLIENT_DATABASE_URL =
PROD_CLIENT_PROJECT_ID =
PROD_CLIENT_STORAGE_BUCKET =
PROD_CLIENT_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID =

# PROD firebase database credentials
PROD_SERVER_DATABASE_URL =

```
